item.title: Automate Deploying WordPress with Ansible
item.description: Ansible is a framework for automating deployment and maintenance of remote systems. This tutorial will go through the creation of my own WordPress playbook for Ansible. You can find all of my WordPress playbooks in Github in my Playbooks repository. wp_install.yml playbook The WordPress installer playbook I created is the wp_install.yml playbook. The playbook handles the installation and configuration of Apache, MySQL, PHP, and WordPress on top of an Ubuntu server (Tested on 22.
